author: ShadyTidus
install_msg:
Thanks for installing ShadyCheatSheet!

Use `/skillcheatsheet` to view the full D&D 5e skill check guide.
Use `/masteries` for weapon mastery properties (2024 rules).
Use slash commands for individual sections.
name: ShadyCheatSheet
short: D&D 5e skill check reference guide and weapon masteries for DMs
description: A comprehensive cheat sheet for D&D 5e skill checks and weapon masteries. Helps new DMs understand when to call for skill checks, how to set DCs, contested checks, group checks, common skill confusions, and includes weapon mastery properties from the 2024 Player's Handbook. Includes quick reference tables and pro tips.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
